item.title: I Try Chatgpt
item.author: Viet Nguyen
item.description: Can chatGPT generate non English language I am very interest with chatGPT when first time heard of it. I also want use it with Vietnamese language which is my mother language. I also want to test my blog can display Vietnamese character. Ask chatGPT for Vietnamese blog sample I am quite supprise to see chatGPT can generate Vietnamese blog. It mean people training chatGPT have used Vietnamese language data.
